Name: MechanicalFuture
About the game: Mechanicalfuture is a stand-alone survival game set in the open world of the post mechanical world. After the last war, man was brought to his knees, and the rest of the survivors nestled in the ruins of a ruthless world ravaged by a mutated machine, high peaks, deep hidden mechanical caves, bunkers and sewers. Long press the space bar to jump up, the left mouse button to attack, ESC to set up some functions such as sound, return to the main interface, exit the game, you can also turn on and turn off the guidance robot.
